BoxInterface.name: Get File Path
BoxInterface.tooltip: Use this box to choose a resource file in its parameters. The filepath will be sent on the output when the input is stimulated.

Input.name: onLoad
Input.tooltip: Signal sent when diagram is loaded.

Input.name: onStart
Input.tooltip: To send the filepath on the output.

Output.name: onStopped
Output.tooltip: The filepath of the selected resource file.

Parameter.name: File path
Parameter.tooltip:
Path of the file (including its name) which is going to be sent on the box output.
Note: You can click on the folder icon to browse the project resources and import files in the resources.
